channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload PRO - Contact Form 7 Standard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload PRO - Contact Form 7 Standard

item.title: CVE-2023-1282|2024-08-02T05:41:00.065Z -- unknown -- drag%20and%20drop%20multiple%20file%20upload%20pro%20-%20contact%20form%207%20standard
item.description: The Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload PRO - Contact Form 7 Standard WordPress plugin before 2.11.1 and Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload PRO - Contact Form 7 with Remote Storage Integrations WordPress plugin before 5.0.6.4 do not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high-privilege users such as admins.
